title: Textile, 1920s
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 96.5 x 76 cm (38 x 30 in.)
Repeat height: 30 3/4 in
description: Large medallion with scenes of ruins. Rural scenes at each corner. Black background. No repeat in width of design. Pattern would repeat as half drop when edges sewn together correctly.
